original_text: Queen Athaliah heard the soldiers and the people as they shouted and praised the new king. So she went to the Lord's temple where all the people were.
korean_text: 아달랴가 백성들이 뛰며 왕을 찬송하는 소리를 듣고 여호와의 전에 들어가서 백성에게 이르러

sentences.original_text: Queen Athaliah heard the soldiers and the people
sentences.korean_translation: 아달랴 여왕은 군인들과 백성들의 소리를 들었고

sentences.original_text: as they shouted and praised the new king
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 새로운 왕을 향해 외치고 찬양하는 소리를

sentences.original_text: So she went to the Lord's temple
